page.syntax: C ui_show_image(C filename [,C title [,N x [,N y [,C style ]]]])

argument.name: filename
argument.description: The name of the Windows Bitmap (.BMP) or JPEG (.JPG) image to display. If the filename is blank, Alpha Five will prompt for a filename.

argument.name: title
argument.description: Optional. The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: x
argument.description: Optional. Default = 4 inches. The width of the dialog box.

argument.name: y
argument.description: Optional. Default = 4 inches. The height of the dialog box.

page.description: Displays a jpeg or bmp image. If filename is null, A5 prompts. Stype is 'Best Fit', 'Absolute' or 'Stretch'
page.discussion: The UI_SHOW_IMAGE() function displays a pop-up dialog displaying a Windows Bitmap (.BMP) or JPEG (.JPG) image. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: Best fit preserves the aspect ratio of the image, but scales it to fit the dialog box.
Absolute preserves the image resolution and shows as much of it as will fit.
Stretch scales the image without regard to its aspect ratio to completely fit the dialog box window.
